docs.text: Hello, my name is Victor Yap and this website is a space for me to write, document and share. Check out my blog here: https://medium.com/@vicyap
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Deploying Ray What is Ray ? From their website, "Ray is an open source project that makes it simple to scale any compute-intensive Python workload — from deep learning to production model serving". Backstory (save this for the blog post) Our previous distributed batch processing tool was AWS ParallelCluster with SGE. Technologies In this walkthrough, I will deploy Ray using Terraform + EKS + Karpenter.
docs.title: Deploying Ray
